overview: A boy named Siam Mehraf was cheated by his friend Ove. Becasue Ove has taken his lover by cheating on him. And there was a lot of quarrel between them about that. At one point Ove and some other people decided to kill Siam. What will he do? Will he die or survive? Will he take revenge on the wrong done to him? It is a story of a mixture of friendship, love and revenge.
title: Bohurupi
